eka paratama baya karala bara wachana dala liyanna ooni na.me alinta ee tharam bayak thibbe nathi handa.eeka uge paduwe api ithin thiyana kamara dala foto gannawa eka eka widiyata.eka dihath tikak balan idala aayeth giya issarahata ammata siri aayeth thani aliyek.muru kiyanawa “mallila aliyawa poddak lagata gamuda kiyala" wahane hodata res kala.aliyata mala panala.res karagena tikak issarahata giya aliya pahu karagena.onna bole meka enawane nalagiriya wage pibagena.api set eka hitagena hitiye jip eke.aliya enawa witharayi kastiya idagena.muru aayeth wahane nawaththuwa.aliyath nawathuna.wahane passata gaththa.menna aliya natta ussagena passata duwanawa.api aayeth hitagaththa wirayo wage.wahane aayeth idiriyata .

prathamayenma ohu thama bhandagarayen mudal yodawa aarambha karanu labanne samupakara pasalak saha welanda salaki.pasalin thamange kriyadamayata awashya liwimata,kiyawimata,ganan thabimata uganwa shrama hamudawa soyaganimata adahas karanu labayi.kalayath samangama ohu samupakara rohalak,prawahana samagamak saha wishwa widyalayak aarambha kirima dakwa dura yayi.kamara 35kin yuthu thama paramparagatha maharaja walawwa ohu rohalata parithyaga karayi.inpasu ohu samupakara wishwa widyalayata athul wu palamu kanthawa ha wiwaha wi samanya niwasaka padinchiyata gos sampurna kriyadamayama thama shrama balakayata pawarayi.me athara indira gandhi wisin maharaja warunge siyaluma balaya ahosi kara depala rajasanthaka karana kriyadamaya gena eyi.namuth ohu siya pradeshaye dewathwaya ha samana thathwayakin ‘janayage raju’ yana anwartha namayen minisunge gaurawadarayata pathwe.
